attributes.action: expand the minimum 5 year sentence for carrying a firearm to include under 21s
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment, if you are caught with a firearm, the minimum sentence of 5 years can only apply to people aged 21 and over. This should also be applicable to under 21s. Surely a 19 year old with a gun should be punished in the exact same way as a 21 year old
